mapper.select: SELECT c.room_id , g.payment_yn , m.month_gwanlibi_no , m.payment_month , m.gagu_gwanlibi FROM IMCHAIN i join constract_info c ON i.imchain_id = c.imchain_phone join gagu_gwanlibi_history g ON c.room_id = g.room_id JOIN MONTH_GWANLIBI m ON g.month_gwanlibi_no = m.month_gwanlibi_no WHERE TO_CHAR(payment_month,'yyyymm') = #{paymentMonth}
